posts.post_content:
I will pay $50 over current/most recent VCP average price for T206 Charles Seitz PSA4/SGC50 or 5/60 in good condition.  Pending scans and assuming average price is within the last year, I will gladly tack on another $50.

Note:  None of those creased/paper-loss PSA roaches that magically get a 4 on them) please :D

LMK and thank you!!

Ed
